Key Match Events: Georges Mikautadze scored from the penalty spot to register his second goal of the tournament
Patrik Schick levelled fortuitously, the ball bouncing in off his chest after Ondrej Lingr’s header cannoned against a post
Pre-Game Insights: The Czech head coach, Ivan Hasek, predicted this would be anything but a wild game
Post-Match Reflections: Willy Sagnol, the Georgia manager, said it may take a few days to raise his player’s spirits after missing a dream-like chance to clinch victory
Sagnol said he hopes the players quickly remember they got their first point at a European Championship
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a frenetic game with 12 shots on goal by the Czechs, 11 of which were saved by Giorgi Mamardashvili
The game had a preposterous finish with a slice of fortune for the Czechs
Others: The match was part of the Euro 2024 competition
